title: LF gold-plat for new team
body:
Old team disbanded due to one of our players being hacked forcing him to convert to dota and another with busy work schedualing therefore I will create a new team and some of the existing members of the old team have decided to play however they are all fairly inactive at the moment so I'll be requiring substitutes. Roles shouldn't be important as this is a semi serious team and I'm sure if you're good you'll be able to play a few roles and will just fill as required (hopefully we will consistently be playing you in the same role though).

Must be gold+ (preferably not gold V because that generally indicates that you might be anywhere ranging bronze -> gold performance)
If you underperform you will get benched/ cut from the team (sometimes cold hearts just need warm smiles :) )
If you play a champion I do not permit you will also be instantly cut (simply because I want to try get organised team comps working whether it be poke, dive etc but I feel having an overall decent team comp will make up for a weak laning phase). Of coarse we'll try adapt some popular LC's comps with whatever champions we have available to us with reference to guide sites and pro matches.


-------------------------------------------
IGN : HTMekkatorque
Rank : gold 3
A list of champions you can play decently well:
Support: Alistar, Janna, Leona, Thresh,  Blitzcrank, Karma
Top: Irelia, kennen, rumble, volibear, jax




If interestted fiill in these details as I have and add me to friends list in game,
Cheers.
